snippet: Accel Partners announced a big investment in Tenable Network Security, a maker of security software, as venture capital firms plow more and more money into such start-ups.
abstract: Accel Partners announced a big investment in Tenable Network Security, a maker of security software, as venture capital firms plow more and more money into such start-ups.

byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and NICOLE PERLROTH

headline.main: Amid Hacker Attacks, Security Start-Ups Draw Attention
